title: SQARR Mini Glass Prep Pinch Bowls, 3.5 inch 4 oz Clear Glass Bowls for Condiments, Small Glass Bowls, and Pinch Bowls (6 Pack)
descriptions:
Introducing the SQARR Mini Glass Prep Pinch Bowls, the perfect addition to your kitchen! 

These 3.5 inch bowls are made from high-quality glass, ensuring durability and longevity. With a capacity of 4 oz, they are just the right size for all your culinary needs. 

The set includes 6 bowls, making it convenient for meal preparation and serving. 

Our pinch bowls have a sleek and simple design, adding a touch of elegance to your table setting. 

But that's not all! These bowls offer a range of features that make them a must-have in any kitchen. They are non-porous, which means they won't absorb odors or stains. They are also microwave and dishwasher safe, making them easy to use and clean. And, they are stackable, allowing for efficient storage in your cabinets. 

The SQARR Mini Glass Prep Pinch Bowls are versatile and suitable for a variety of uses. They are perfect for holding condiments, spices, ingredients, candy, desserts, and even ice cream. 

Whether you are a home cook, a professional chef, or a baker, these bowls will be a valuable addition to your kitchen. They are suitable for use in restaurants, cafes, bakeries, and of course, in your own home. 

Don't miss out on these stylish and practical bowls. Upgrade your kitchenware with the SQARR Mini Glass Prep Pinch Bowls today!
